summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing their recent travels and plans. Epstein inquires about Staley's location and activities, while Staley shares details about his travels in New England and plans to be in London. The email highlights their personal relationship and informal communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, reaching out to Jes Staley to inquire about his whereabouts and activities.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, providing updates about his travels and expressing a relaxed state of mind.

persons.name: Peter Staley
persons.context: Peter Staley is mentioned by Jes Staley as having spent the night with him, indicating a familial relationship.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating informally about their personal lives and travel plans, indicating a friendly relationship.
Jes Staley mentions his brother Peter, indicating a familial connection.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is reaching out to Jes Staley regarding his whereabouts and activities.
Jes Staley mentions spending time in various locations including Nantucket, Vineyard, Newport, and Stonington.
Staley indicates he will be in London mid-week.
Peter Staley is mentioned as having spent the night with Jes Staley.
